website_summaries.verdict: A scratch-off map with intricate detail, including U.S. states.
pros: A large map that takes up the entire poster for maximum detail
Includes a cardboard tube, making it a good choice for travel
cons: The map beneath the gold foil has somewhat dull colors, and it's difficult to find a frame to fit this map

website_summaries.verdict: This best-selling wall map is interactive as well as attractive: scratch off the places you've been, or give as a gift to your favorite globe-trotter.
pros: Extraordinary detail and accurate depictions of cities, land masses, and boundaries
Map is sturdy and fits into an A1-sized frame
Packaging is heavy-duty and keeps map from damage
easy to find the outline of what to scratch off, especially with U.S. states
cons: Some smaller islands aren't on the map
other areas are not completely outlined, such as a few of the Chinese provinces

customer_reviews.title: Not As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: What I received is not the same as what was pictured. It is missing a lot of features/islands, has a different font and general orientation, and did not come with a scratch tool. The new font is juvenile and the scratch lines inconsistent in terms of what is seen and what is revealed below.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easily ruined
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this map and it came as described. Looks great. Only issue I had was that as I was scratching off some of the states, my forearm removed a large swath of South America, which I've never been to. One would think only a coin or guitar pick or something similar would be able to remove sections of the map, but apparently a forearm can do the same. I could see if I had a shirt with a zipper or button on it, but it was just my bare forearm. For $30, I would have expected better. This is a great map if you exercise extreme care when scratching off parts you've been to.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Scratched off before arrival
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say. I was very excited to give this map to my traveling girlfriend for our future adventures abroad. However, upon opening the map it revealed that some of the map had been scratched off in the corners! Completely unacceptable. Returning for a full refund ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Levinton

customer_reviews.title: It's a poster with an activity associated with it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a traveler. He really liked the way it is and when I informed him that you scratch off all the countries he visited he was so surprised. I put it in a poster frame that I bought at Walmart. Nice idea for someone who travels.
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: Scratches off as you open it
customer_reviews.text: gave this as a gift to my mom who I've done a lot of traveling with. Some of the countries were scratched off just as she was removing it from the tube. so disappointing :/
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed - colors are bland
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this map. The colors they portrayed would be underneath the gold are not true. It is more of a grey color with a hint of greenish yellow. I've scratched off most of the US and it all looks the same with maybe a tint of different colors here and there. It also came scratched up, it looks like lines were scratched into it while they were packaging it. I would not buy this again, and I would not recommend this to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but stuff rubs off just touching it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful map, however, the scratch off stuff comes off super easy. Just touching it with your finger smears it and partially comes off. This won't be durable to display very long. What a shame. Nice paper, nice details.
customer_reviews.author: MitchS

customer_reviews.title: great map for memories
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this as a gift for a friend, she really liked it and was exactly what it looked like. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nana Shell

customer_reviews.title: Scratch
customer_reviews.text: If you scratch a "destination" a little swiftly, it will rip through the map. Wish the quality was a little better or that it came with a gentle guitar pick of sorts.
customer_reviews.author: Shahzia Lakhani

customer_reviews.title: This map is great! After reading some of the reviews I was ...
customer_reviews.text: This map is great! After reading some of the reviews I was a bit scared but I'm glad I ordered it. The countries on the gold foil match what's on the actual map. It came without any scratches in a thick tube and another poster box over it. It's a good size, only issue is finding a frame to match it. The colors of the countries aren't bright and a couple of the states are the same color. Other then that it's a great product and I will definitely order from them again! P.s. I used textbooks to hold down the edges to get it straight and I used an eraser and a plastic mechanical pencil (for the small countries)
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Scratch off so faint dont need a quarter beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: The covering is so faint it comes off simply by brushing against it. Its not at all like a scratch off where u need a quarter to remove it. I tried to get a replacement one because we had ours only a week and hadnt even had chance to hang it. The company said no too bad, so sad. Well Ill be disputing with my credit card company. Its cheap. Cute idea but scratch off is ridiculously flim flam. Dont buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Super detailed map, elegant, and fun! Scratches off easily and the state shapes for the US are defined enough to make sure you're only scratching off one state. Can't speak for any other countries ....yet ;) If you're worried about framing, there is about a 1/4 of an inch worth of white border around the map so a poster frame won't cover it. I got a poster frame from Walmart for about $14 and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect measurements provided
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality but I am giving it one star due to the fact that the dimensions provided in the product information are not accurate. I purchased this map because according to the information, the dimensions were exactly what I needed. However they are not. The height measures almost 24 inches, not 23 inches. I haven’t bothered to open it yet because now I have to purchase a new frame for it, therefore I can’t state the length of the width.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed  :o(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in thus map! :o( The colors are so washed out you cannot see what states and countries have been scratched off and which have not. Islands in the Pacific and Caribean do not show up at all. To be effective and attractive, the colors on this map need to be MUCH bolder and more colorful!
customer_reviews.author: mary b

customer_reviews.title: does not stick out
customer_reviews.text: not very detailed map. Some of the colors are the same once you scratch it off so it doesnt look as impressive when you scratch off a whole continent. The Black maps that have very vibrant colors once you scratch off a location is probably better.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have every country
customer_reviews.text: Aruba isn't on here, I bought this to track all the places I've visited with my husband and the first place we went after purchasing the map was Aruba, which wasn't on here. Otherwise it's cool.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Milsted

customer_reviews.title: Cute for my gold / white home decor
customer_reviews.text: True to picture. Awkward size to find a cork board, but I was able to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: cds

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas as she has wanderlust and has traveled abroad. I recently visited her and saw she'd hung it up. I saw that Antarctica had been scratched off. I asked her about it because I knew she hadn't been there. She said the map arrived that way. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Var

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Interesting to Have, but not 100% Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of these scratch-off maps that was more muted in color than some of the black and brightly colored maps. So, I was happy to find this one. As with any flat map, the countries and sizes would be skewed, but that is unavoidable without splitting throughout. My big issue is that Alaska and Russia appear twice along the edges. The North American and Asian continents are complete in the middle, but then they appear again on the edges where the Earth was 'split.' Why not just leave it as empty ocean or take in the edges?
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my world traveling husband!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift along with a large bulletin board to put it on display. He loves it and we are currently looking for a good place to display it in our home. It's a rather large map, which is great for us as you can really see the colors as they pop out once you've scratched away the surface. He was quite excited and the map is made of good material so it looks like it will last a long time. We are excited to put it to good use!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sterrett

customer_reviews.title: The worst. Just don’t!
customer_reviews.text: This is awful. First, it’s tiny. Second, countries and cities etc are not labeled on the top of the gold scratch off material, so you need to know exactly where to scratch and it’s super small. Worst of all is when you scratch your location, it appears in a dark bluish green that blends with the water so unless you’re specifically looking for a spot, you can’t tell what the highlighted locations should be at quick glance. The worst!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I had this professionally mounted as a Christmas gift for my son who is a world traveler. He loved it, however upon closer inspection we noticed that a couple of countries appear twice and a couple of counties are missing. So if accuracy is what you want, this may not be for you. However, it looked great and was awesome mounted.
customer_reviews.author: MeIGot2B

customer_reviews.title: Loved this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend who loves to travel!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this gift and so did he. It is really beautiful and accurately made. I would recommend it for anyone who loves to travel and travels often. Be super careful moving it. We waited to frame it because we were moving from an apartment to a house in the near future and when we moved it, we noticed it scratched easily. It was unfortunate but is minor and still looks good fortunately!
customer_reviews.author: Graesyn

customer_reviews.title: Showcase your wanderlust and make your friends jealous
customer_reviews.text: As a person with wanderlust, I wanted a way to track my travels that was not just country specific, but could track my road trips within the US too. This map is perfect for that. It’s big and durable...although I would not want to scratch off the gold with anything metal. I use a plastic guitar pick and that is perfect. Underneath the gold is nice details with capital and other topographic features. The seller even gives you suggestions for framing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Geist

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & color scheme
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter, who has wanted a scratch off map for quite some time. The gold/white combination on the map adds a pop of color to the usually darker, duller scratch off map options. We both like that there are US state divisions on this map, so you can scratch off one state at a time. The pastel colors of the countries underneath the gold pair well with the color scheme, making it look cleaner than other maps. Overall, the quality is good for a scratch off map. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Conte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Valentine’s Day gift for my boyfriend who is a pilot. My thought was we could use it to scratch off places we visit together or even places he has flown to for work. He absolutely loved it! It is the perfect size, perfect for framing and hanging on the wall, he plans to get an open frame and scratch off places while it hangs on the wall. It was delivered tube style and I was hesitant about some countries being scratched off like others noted but it was delivered spotless! I highly recommend this map for anyone, I’m not sure I could’ve found a better quality map either!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I hoped for or envisioned considering the price. I was very disappointed when I took it out of the time and looked at it. I then read the reviews and realized I should have read the reviews before ordering. I definitely looked cheap and poorly made. If it had cost me $10, I would say it was good, but $30 was way, way over priced. I returned the item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The colors underneath the scratch materials are very dull and hard to differentiate from the upper layer. After scratching a country/state off, you barely see a difference. Unfortunately I missed my return window for this product, otherwise I would request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how the quality of the scratch off is, you have to deliberately scratch something off with pressure, so there is no worry that you may accidentally scratch a nearby country or something off. By the picture I had assumed it was white and gold but once you scratch the gold off it's like a regular map. But overall we are very pleased with this and would recommend to anyone who loves to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful map to track your travels
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality beautiful map to track my travels. You can scratch off each country you visit and it turns from a soft gold colour to a full colour map of that country. It's a very striking visual indicator of where you've been. Makes a great wall hanging, but don't make it permanent because you'll need to take it down to scratch some more when you return from your next visit. I'm very happy with the quality of this map, and very happy with the visuals. Wonderful idea.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Griggs

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this!
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this map! After MUCH research I decided to give this map a shot. So many maps online are black and I love the colors on this map. When it arrived it was beautiful!! Except for this one corner of russia, it was damaged, already scratched off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The concept is good but this map was not
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the buy. The colors underneath were almost identical to the one you scratch off. The concept is good but this map was not.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hritz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of art!
customer_reviews.text: I love this map. I have always wanted to keep track of the countries/states/provinces I've travelled to and this is the perfect way for me to see what next adventure I need to head off to. I saw this at my nephew's home and gifted it to me. It's a great gift to give to a young adult not only to understand countries and locations, but also to allow them to dream and as they begin their travels to remind them of where they've been. A truly great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Obuchowski

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend who loves to travel. It's done well but I wish it had the flags of the countries at the bottom and zoomed in section for the Caribbean islands like I saw on another map. The colors are like a classic world map which is why I chose this map over another. Not a fan of the "Scratch the World" in big letters.
customer_reviews.author: nature mom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this from here
customer_reviews.text: Map had scratching on it upon arrival. Was not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing state outlines
customer_reviews.text: Nice map, but the one I got doesn't have state outlines.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised! Looks very nice in my parents' room
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 17x22 inch version for my parents and it came with a smaller map just for the USA. The map is exactly as advertised in the pictures you see. The quality of the map is also very good, lots of cities are labeled, lines are accurate for the most part. The foil is very easy to scratch off, unlike some other maps listed on Amazon. I bought this map, as well as the other popular on Amazon black & gold scratch off map, and this map is definitely higher quality. I'm thinking about buying the larger version of this map to replace the other Amazon black & gold one in my room.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this if you want to struggle finding a frame
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes to put it up when I move but I didn't realize how rare the frame size was for this scratch map. There are custom frame options but not worth it when it costs more than the map. If I could do this again I would buy an already framed one on Etsy without the logo showing at a similar price point. Lesson learned..
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it is a pain to find a frame to make it look nice.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE This, but it has been a huge pain. I want it to look nice and fill out a frame. NOTE this does not fit any of our standard frames. It is exactly what I wanted so I kept it, but it's a pain trying to make it look nice without spending a ton on a custom frame. I am going to cut it down and cut foam board to get it to fit nicely into a frame and how the foam board will hold a push pin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful versatile gift
customer_reviews.text: We've gifted the scratch map to traveling family members, including college students touring as many countries as they can get to while studying abroad for a semester. One was presented to us as a way to showcase all the countries we've hosted (for dinner or longer), with 93+ countries scratched off. It's always fun for guests to see how many international visitors have preceded them in our home and especially enjoy being the first to represent their country so get to do the scratching!
customer_reviews.author: International hosts

customer_reviews.title: Hard to frame. Gold easily wipes off
customer_reviews.text: The paper isn’t great quality and hard to frame without a glass
customer_reviews.author: NONA THORNTON

customer_reviews.title: Best scratch off
customer_reviews.text: Love this map it is beautiful. Great quality and I like the countries coloring when you scratch their areas. I had it framed in gold and blackish brown and it looks super fancy. I plan to put gems on the cities. Absolutely love this.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a retirement gift for my friend to track her travels. It was the perfect gift. I as a little concerned about the fact that this product is a scratch off and whether it would all be in tacked once opened. All looked good when opened. The gold overlay on the map was all still in place. Product was delivered timely. The map looked just as featured on Amazon. Product was made of good quality. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MP 9504

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of this and this one is great ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this and this one is great because I love the aesthetics but I wish I had known that some of the color will scratch off entirely. You have to be firm to get the gold off and then I've ended up scratching islands right off the map. The gold needs to be softer so that it doesn't take off the country
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Pretty map!
customer_reviews.text: I like the map. It looks beautiful. We had a lot of fun scratching off al the places we have been and planning on where to go next. I bought it together with the bulletin frame that was suggested below the product. It did not fit the bulletin perfectly (Quartet Bulletin Board, Cork Board, 2' x 3', Black Frame (MWDB2436-BK)) as the map was too large for it. I but the maps edges to make it fit. However, if you want to preserve the integrity of your map... you may want to order a different frame.
customer_reviews.author: Blanka Angyal

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travelers
customer_reviews.text: This map is exactly what I wanted. I have traveled extensively most of my adult life, both in my 21 years as a Marine and 32 cruises with my wife. I wanted a map with the names of the major cities of the world and this one meets my needs. Packaging and shipping was great and on time. Iwould highly recommend this map to anyone. I intend to mount it on poster board (Cork) and use push pins to mark our world travels.
customer_reviews.author: Robert MiksadKindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clever Coordinator
customer_reviews.text: Fun concept. Gold scratch of material tends to come of in flakes, making precision difficult. IMHO the "Scratch the World" text takes away from the classiness/formality.
customer_reviews.author: OViciousOne

customer_reviews.title: Suggested add-on products are supposed to fit!
customer_reviews.text: The map is fine, but we also purchased the suggested cork board to go with it and the cork board is too small! What's up with that?
customer_reviews.author: itscakeoclocksomewhere

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect gift for a world traveller!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I stumbled upon this map. I bought it for a 97 year old friend who has travelled the world over. I bought the cork board at Michael's and push pins as well. It made for a wonderful visit as she really enjoyed scratching off the countries and marking the cities she visited with the push pins. So glad I found it. Made a perfect Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: pdough

customer_reviews.title: NO FRAME.
customer_reviews.text: The first photo for this product falsely makes it appear that it comes in a frame. It does not. Just the poster.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLB3

customer_reviews.title: Makes You Want to See More of the World
customer_reviews.text: It's true that the colors are muted, but they are still easy to distinguish. It is also easy to scratch off (I had a previous map that was NOT) and makes a great gift for a traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The map is smaller than advertised. I bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: The map is smaller than advertised. I bought a 24x36 frame in conjunction with this map, per the comments that were provided by the seller. However, this is at least 2" smaller on both length AND width than advertised. Such a bummer...and a major inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley O.

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but don’t love the size
customer_reviews.text: I love this map and it was well produced and well packed for shipping. My only complaint is the size - it’s not a standard frame size, so either you have to a) get it framed which is expensive b) affix it to a too large frame and try to mat it yourself so the edges don’t show, or c) trim it to fit a smaller frame. None of these are ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this map as a gift, and it came it packaged well, and looks just like advertised. I gave it as a gift, so I cannot tell you about how the scratching off goes, but I did receive prompt emails from the company, and the map looks great. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pereboom

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, not great execution
customer_reviews.text: 1.) Lots of wasted ocean space. 2.) gold layer scratches off too easily, even with your sleeve - be careful. 3.) Not much contrast; you need to use fingernail polish to see where you've been.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Two Maps for the price of one!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality scratch off maps :) came rolled in a thick cardboard tube, no damage. and came with a bonus USA map! i would recommend scratching some of the places off ~ before ~ you put it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Beaches

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I am dissapointed that this cost as much as another scratch off map I bought and it didn’t come with all the extras, like a smaller separate USA map, a scratching tool, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Damaged upon arrival and waaaay overpriced for quality. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Schieman

customer_reviews.title: Where's map? The case was empty
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it. Where's map? The case was empty No maps, one lid missing from the original case. Where's map?
customer_reviews.author: SUNYOUNG JANG

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With my Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new map! It is exactly as described and just perfect, I cannot wait to frame it and scratch off the all the locations I have visited so far and the many more to come! This map just brought me so much joy.....it was packaged very well and it was perfect with no markings, tears, dents, or scratches. I will be the first to break this map in! Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this poster!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this poster to my boyfriend for valentines day so we could use it to scratch off places we visit/have visited together! It is a fun memory for us and looks great for wall decor!!!! We framed it and put it up above our couch because it fills up a lot of wall space easily. The colors are great and looks as pictured! but beware, it does scratch easily so don't rub it up against anything or try to put it back into it's tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Wish i hadnt bought it.
customer_reviews.text: The countries don't pop out as much. I've found a replacement that I like better that's black and countries bright neon colored. Also has the European countries blown up big and a bucket list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, as described! Buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as part of our 1st anniversary gift. It’s at the frame store getting framed so I can’t take a photo but he quality was great and it came in a VERY sturdy cardboard cylinder! I can’t wait to start scratching places off!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda lynn champagne

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I travel around the world. After visiting our 3rd country this year, we thought it would be fun to purchase a map where we can document our travels. Now we are on our 6th country and are hoping to hit 10 by the end of the year! This map is very accurate, sturdy, and beautiful! I use a golf T ( I know, weird choice) to scratch off the countries. It has the perfect point at the end where it doesn't ruin It. I usually do a lot of research before purchasing anything so I knew this would be great quality! I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Riley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a portable cardboard tube and is a nice size. Not too big
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a portable cardboard tube and is a nice size. Not too big. My nephew loved his and started scratching off places he'd been immediately; he's 17. The 25 year old was less enthused; apparently, there are a few web apps for iPhone and Android that will calculate all kinds of metrics for you when you input where you have been. Overall, I liked this map and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Shipped already scratched
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. When we started scratching who noticed that some of the map had already been scratched. Felt like it was too late to send back since we hadn’t noticed it before.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Chicoine

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the item arriving damaged like many other shoppers complained, but mine arrived in perfect condition! The map looks very expensive. I've put it on a board and gave it to my friend as a gift, he absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: What a fun map! The quality is great. The gold is pretty. I took someone's suggestion and used a mechanical pencil for the smaller countries/states. A little hard to differentiate some countries, otherwise a good map. Looks like I have a lot more traveling to do. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bam

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my husband as a gift and he loved it. It's a nice way of remembering our ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift and he loved it. It's a nice way of remembering our trips together. It arrived in great condition (no scratches or folds). The only thing I don't like about it is that its dimensions are very strange; I had to buy a 3 x 2 frame and fill in the gaps with scrapbook paper.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandma so she could follow my travels and scratch off as I tell her where I’ve been. She LOVES it. However, I ended up being the one to scratch off the places. You have to have really steady hands.. I do not..
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I have this as a gift to my brother who is traveling the world in his spare time. He lived it and had been wanting one like it. Now I can keep up with his adventures and where he's been.
customer_reviews.author: UndercoverMother

customer_reviews.title: Great map for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this idea! Easy (but not overly easy as to accidentally remove areas) to scratch the desired areas. Only weird part is Russia and Alaska are duplicated on the left and right sides. Not a big deal to me but people might be particular about the obscurement.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Be careful upon removing from packing tube.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the map. I’m so glad I chose the gold; it brings a little class to a pretty boring subject (geography). Only negative is that I didn’t realize it was so delicate. After I excitedly opened the package to take a quick peek, I then rolled it back up and placed it back into the tube. It was a gift. When I presented the gift and the map was removed for a second time, part of Russia was scraped off.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Danese

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Awfully disappointed!! Advertised as a scratch off with different colors for each country. Come to find, as we're scratching off our travels..all countries are a duller gold below the shiny gold cover. What happened to advertised map?!! Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for travelers. The only thing I don't like is that the smaller size makes it hard to find the state's and European countries. I'd recommend the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: KarenB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as she wanted to scratch off her 'worldly' travels. It looks nice and is presentable as a "conversation starter" when mounted in a nice 'custom' frame. The gold masking (rub off) material looks classy and the print has been done cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bray

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Travel Log
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this kind of map I thought it would be a wonderful addition to keep track of family adventures and my daughters were quite excited when we scratched off a couple of our trips. The map is beautiful, but as mentioned with the packaging some care is necessary when unrolling the map as some of the material could accidentally become scrapped off. Which happened to us, so our daughters said we would have to travel to South Africa now to make the map correct.
customer_reviews.author: G. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a huge world map & was placing stickers on the places I've been. This is significantly smaller but BETTER! A very minor complaint is that a short line had been scratched off, but it's not so much that it looks intentional. I love my map & look forward to being able to scratch off more places!
customer_reviews.author: Nay W.

customer_reviews.title: Foil scratches easily and accidentally
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when handling and scratching. Foil scratches easily and accidentally. And my daughter pressed too hard while scratching and the print came off underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this product so bad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift i was kinda worried that the reviews about the material is true so i scratched California to test it. It was very smooth. However, part of the base paper got scratched too. I still have the map with me im not sure if im even going to give it as a gift anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Micaelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son mounted and framed the scratch map for me and gave to me as a gift. Love it! It has me even more inspired to travel. This is a great retirement gift for people who want to travel.
customer_reviews.author: off the cuff Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend for her birthday & she loved it! I picked this one, because it seemed like it had the best colors revealed after scratching. When I gave it to her she immediately got a quarter and started scratching. She's 39 - so it's a winner for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: Steph D

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality. Came in a cardboard poster tube for protection which worked great. Got to give as a gift and they love it! Such a neat thing
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous except it came all scratch up on new zealand and Australia. I guess I'll have to go there to make it accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Latham Ingersoll

customer_reviews.title: Fun, accurate map
customer_reviews.text: Neat, fun map. I bought 2, one for me, one for my husband since we’ve been to some different countries. Takes a while to scratch off Russia!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Pasqualino

customer_reviews.title: Size is not exactly 33x23
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 33x23 size map. However, the actually dimensions are slightly larger. Height is about 23 1/2. This is a problem as I ordered a nice 33x23 frame to display the map in. Which it obviously doesn't fit properly. Very disappointed. Company should have given accurate dimensions for this product! Otherwise, the map arrived in good ship and looks nice. Note: I also have the Maps International US map. This map's dimensions were as advertised and fit into the appropriate sized frame.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! I would buy it again and again. I used a needle to outline the states and scratched off some with the needle at an angle. I did push a little hard in areas and you can see the scratch lines when you pull out a magnifying glass lol. No one noticed but me. This is hung in my entryway and will be a great talking point. Now I just need to travel more to scratch more countries. I would recommend it! It came perfectly packaged with no scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Mae Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great travel map!
customer_reviews.text: This map looks great! Its easy to scratch-off, and important cities are marked clearly. Bought a framed cork board to put behind this so I can display it and put pins in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanvir Talukder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a traveler in your family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my daughter the little traveler! She loves how she can scrape off where she has been! Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: mmcgee2705

customer_reviews.title: Ok map for price, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Missing some countries that I actually visited :( the locations don’t really stand out from the gold scratch off color so it is hard to tell the places you have been unless you examine the map close up.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Nice map - makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a family member that travels a lot. She loved it! Easy to keep rolled up, lay flat, or put into an easily accessible frame.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Peer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality. The map is beautiful and scratching off is easy. Makes a wonderful addition to a room when framed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Antosz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to scratch
customer_reviews.text: I love the presentation of this, and how easy to scratch it is. I also like that once it is scratched it shows not just the capital but also all of the major towns around. I highly recommend it as a gift. And if possible pre-frame it. Since it is so easy to scratch without the frame you can ruin it during a move.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love this map!
customer_reviews.text: I used this as an anniversary gift! It came rolled in a hard cardboard tube and wrapped in plastic. I was able to unroll it, scratch off the cities we'd been to together, roll it back up, and get it inside the tube without issue. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Coppola

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute I love it! Wish it had something to help scratch off the places but other than that it’s exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Secora

customer_reviews.title: Lovely piece.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. We just framed it. Didn’t scratch it off. Lovely piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tanz

customer_reviews.title: Super cool - but please make it in bigger sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my world-traveler friend for Christmas and she loves it. It was fun to see the world burst into color when she marked the places she's been and she now has it framed. I hope this company starts to make bigger versions. I would love a giant wall one but so far that size does not exist.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Warning! This will make you want to plan more travels!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condidtion. Had a great weekend scratching this off at my parents recounting tons of travel stories. I thought I had traveled a lot, but this map has inspired me to plan to travel even more!
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Paint doesn’t line up
customer_reviews.text: The paint did not line up with the countries, and looked really shoddily done. These are clearly mass-produced, which is fine, but my map must not have been lined up with the paint machine. Looking at other customer images, not everyone has this problem, but know it’s a possibility. See my images for details
customer_reviews.author: Scrapinpics

customer_reviews.title: Very nifty idea, great present for those that travel often!
customer_reviews.text: I see that others have had issues with the map having some places scratched. That's likely just due to handling in the shipping process. The one I received was flawless and served it's job well! I purchased this as a fun future goal for my friends that got engagement as they both enjoy traveling, but really this can be given to anyone who plans to one day in the future visit many states/countries!
customer_reviews.author: Senan

product_meta.title: Maps International Scratch The World Travel Map - Scratch Off World Map Poster - X-Large 23 x 33 50 Years of Map Making - Cartographic Detail Featuring Country & State Borders
feature_bullets: CARTOGRAPHIC DETAIL WORLD MAP WITH US STATES: Our XL size allows for that extra map detail not seen on smaller maps. Scratch off travel map world destinations to reveal the colorful political map underneath. With more than 50 years experience of making maps, our team are based in Minnesota and the UK. Western view of the world and not the Chinese view like many other scratch maps.

EXTRA LARGE WALL MAP: One of the largest Scratch Off Map of the World Poster’s you will find, measuring 23 (h) x 33 (w) inches - the huge world map has outlines on the gold coating and details on the map underneath. Updated in 2019, the best mapping detail you will find for scratch map world poster. Featuring countries in different colors and their boundaries, cities, hill shading, the highest mountains, rivers, bathymetry and state outlines on scratch coating and mapping underneath.

WORLD SCRATCH OFF MAP TRAVELER GIFT: The most wished for wall map in the USA, this scratch off map of the world is a great gift for your favorite adventurer to plan a trip on the world map wall poster then record their journey! Also, the perfect gift to educate young explorers.
CREASE-FREE DELIVERY: Your travel scratch off world map is rolled in a tube by our specialist map team in Minnesota, for delivery, so it arrives ready to display.

MAPS INTERNATIONAL: Our philosophy of 'cartographic excellence' combines detail, design and high-quality finishes in a range of stunning wall maps. As an Internationally renowned cartographic company, our expert team based in Minnesota and in the UK, work with passion, on a stunning range of maps for all moods and homes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,089 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
